section.p: This section of the design file that define the measurement filters.

section.p: The standard version of Teolenn contains 2 measurement filters:

ul.li: floatrange: Filter float measurement values that are not in a defined range.

section.p: Note that this step can be skipped by setting the skip attribute to true in measurementfilters tag.

subsection.name: Use external measurement filters
